name: MrBombe
description:
Descritpion:
MrBombe is a local multiplayer game. Each player is at first alone and will have to survive until the end, for that he will have to lay bombs to break blocks and get bonuses.

Gameplay:

When the player breaks a block he will probably get a bonus.
The game map is procedurally generated, some of the blocks are indestructible.
The game finish when only 1 player left and he's the new MrBombe.

Objectives:
To win he must be the last one alive and kill the other players with his bombs. At the beginning, the player can only place one bomb at a time.

Are you the next famous MrBombe ? Show us your talents and good luck.

Inputs: (but can be changed in game)
